item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Home.Alone.3.1997.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Home Alone 3

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Alternate Artwork 8 | Alternate Artwork 9 | Alternate Artwork 10 | Alternate Artwork 11 | Alternate Artwork 12 | Alternate Artwork 13 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Poster 5 | Poster 6 | Thumbnail 1 | Thumbnail 2 | Key Art


1997 • 1h 42m
Family, Comedy

Description
When a gang of criminals steals a top-secret computer chip that they hide inside a toy car, they come up against eight year-old Alex Pruitt, who is home alone with the chicken pox.
Click to expand...
Trailers

Home Alone 3 Trailer
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
In the third riotous installment of the hit series, a group of spies hides a computer chip in a toy car that winds up in the hands of eight-year-old Alex. Home alone with the chicken pox, Alex sees the spies breaking into his neighbors’ houses in search of the car. And when they finally locate the car – and Alex – he’s got plenty of rigged devices and booby traps waiting for them!
Duration: 1h 42m
Release Date: 1997
Genre: Family, Comedy
Rating:
Director: Raja Gosnell
Starring: Alex D. Linz, Olek Krupa, Haviland Morris, David Thornton, Scarlett Johansson, Lenny Von Dohlen
Click to expand...
